title: How to Make a BICtory Pen Mod for Pen Spinning

steps.title: Requirements- You need two BIC速 "round stic速" pens.
steps.content: Requirements- You need two BIC速 "round stic速" pens. These pens can be bought virtually anywhere, from office stores like Staples to shopping websites like Amazon. You also need a chopstick or a handy tool for removing the tip off of the pen, and a pair of scissors to cut the ink tubes. We will discuss that later in this article. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Take the caps off the two pens and then break the "clip" of the cap with your hand or the scissors.
steps.content: Take the caps off the two pens and then break the "clip" of the cap with your hand or the scissors. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Take the "front part" (the tip that you write with) out of both pens.
steps.content: Take the "front part" (the tip that you write with) out of both pens. It should come off along with the ink tube. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Remove the plug on the top of the pen with a chopstick.
steps.content: Remove the plug on the top of the pen with a chopstick. You can also use your teeth to bite off the plug. ( NOTE: You only need to do this with one pen.)

steps.title: Cut off about 7 mm off of each ink tube with scissors.
steps.content: Cut off about 7 mm off of each ink tube with scissors. This is important so the ink tubes can fit easier. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Now take the ink tubes and insert them into the pen with no "plug."
steps.content: Now take the ink tubes and insert them into the pen with no "plug." They go in on each side. ( NOTE: The tips may not exactly fit onto the pen. You might need to tape one of them in order for the tip to stay on.) [5] X Research source

steps.title: Take both of the pen caps and put them on.
steps.content: Take both of the pen caps and put them on. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Follow steps 1-4 above.
steps.content: Follow steps 1-4 above. You will need two BIC Ultra Round Stic pens for this mod, which is longer. Step four is optional as the end result's longer.

steps.title: Take the ink tubes out of the Ultra Round Stics (URSs for short).
steps.content: Take the ink tubes out of the Ultra Round Stics (URSs for short). You may need to apply a bit of force.

steps.title: Next, follow step five, but use the URS ink tubes instead of the regular ones.
steps.content: Next, follow step five, but use the URS ink tubes instead of the regular ones.
